short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to monitor and limit web browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to help us manage our time spent browsing the internet through Chrome. It tracks how much time we spend on each website, and provides an option to limit the amount of time we spend on any particular website. This helps us maintain a healthy digital lifestyle, be more productive, and reduce the amount of time we spend on activities that are not beneficial.

Key features include:
- List view and chart view (Website - View Time).
- Limit the view time for any Website.
- Chart view for the active time duration (start and end time) spent on a website.
- Trend chart which tracks the progress made over the days.
